body.name: VIZIO 43-inch D-Series Full HD 1080p Smart TV with Apple AirPlay and Chromecast Built-in, TV Only (Renewed)
body.stockDetail: Only 10 left in stock - order soon.

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: 1080p High-Definition - Watch TV in crisp, clear 1080p Full HD resolution and experience a brilliant picture with the VIZIO D-Series.
Full Array LED Backlight - Evenly distributed LEDs across the screen’s backlight deliver superior light uniformity and picture performance.
IQ Picture Processor - Delivers superior picture processing, faster navigation, and quicker load times to get to your favorite content faster.
V-Gaming Engine - Automatically optimizes picture mode for gaming and makes next-gen console gameplay more responsive with Auto Game Mode and D-Series lowest input lag.
SmartCast - With intuitive navigation, enjoy instant access to the best selection of apps from top-tier streaming services like Netflix, Disney+, YouTube, HBO Max and many more right out of the box.

WatchFree+ - WatchFree+ is like cable TV, but streaming and free. Watch hundreds of channels of live TV and on demand content including news, sports, movies, TV shows and foreign language programming across an ever-expanding catalog. No logins. No subscriptions. No fees. Just free entertainment.
body.description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Completely Shot, less than one year.
reviews.reviewText: If you want this tv - buy the warranty. Just before the one year mark it’s strained and screen is completely shot. No damage, sitting on a stand in same spot since day one. No help from Amazon, should have bought from Costco *facepalm*

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Its huge! Just a few minor things.
reviews.reviewText: This tv is so much better than I expected! Great for gaming! Though everytime I turn my playstation on the tv turns on and vise versa. I have to unplug my tv for the PlayStation to even show on the screen.. also watching movies on the TV from watch free is really laggy and just terrible, same with connecting my phone to the tv. Other than that it's a pretty good one. Only time will tell how long it lasts. So far I've had it since December.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like that it’s user friendly for senior citizens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The price was right for a nice picture
reviews.reviewText: I feel like the only thing that could be better they can come with better stands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not work
reviews.reviewText: So disappointing. Did not work right out of the box and no instruction Manual. contacted customer service and they just said to return it to UPS. At 85 y.o. I find it difficult to lift the box and find a ride to the UPS store.Ordered a new one from Costco

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does the trick
reviews.reviewText: The picture is all right, the sound is pretty good, the remote is a little less responsive than you’d like it to be especially with volume and stuff, it takes about an hour for it to kind of warm up and the system to start running at a normal speed… When I first got it out of the box, the screen was concave in one corner and I used a suction cup to pull it back into place. It is fairly lightweight and it fits a spot above the fireplace nicely. Overall I’m just happy it didn’t arrive with a cracked screen, and I feel pretty good about this purchase. Didn’t need anything too fancy just something to watch news and Netflix and Amazon movies. Does the trick!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m thankful for the affordable price & TV. However, it doesn’t allow me to AirPlay & I’ve had this TV before so the set up isn’t new to me. The sound systems is also not the best, quite frustrating but again thankful so thankful. I would advice investing in a sound system 🙏🏾
